sentence: Home Depot, Inc. ( HD ) will begin trading ex-dividend on December 02, 2014.
A cash dividend payment of $0.47 per share is scheduled to be paid on December 18, 2014.
Shareholders who purchased HD stock prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 4th quarter that HD has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $99.4, the dividend yield is 1.89%.
The previous trading day's last sale of HD was $99.4, representing a -0.4% decrease from the 52 week high of $99.80 and a 34.4% increase over the 52 week low of $73.96.
HD is a part of the Consumer Services sector, which includes companies such as Lowe's Companies, Inc. ( LOW ) and Sherwin-Williams Company ( SHW ).
HD's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $4.4.
Zacks Investment Research reports HD's forecasted earnings growth in 2015 as 19.51%, compared to an industry average of 3.2%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the HD Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.

It also has the highest percent weighting of HD at 7.25%.
